projects.title: Musterm (API)
projects.desc: Musterm is a website that serves as a Digital Dictionary of Medical Terminology for the Musculoskeletal System. It provides information on the body's system consisting of muscles, bones, joints, and other connective tissues.

projects.title: Larazer
projects.desc: Larazer is an organizational management system. This system will assist administrators in managing members and programs effectively.

projects.title: Educa
projects.desc: Educa is a platform for learning courses on accounting. This allows for adding, editing, and deleting courses. It features admin and user roles, as well as a file upload functionality for course assignments.

projects.title: SiDemit
projects.desc: Sidemit is an e-commerce website for purchasing clothing. It includes features for adding, editing, and deleting products, updating stock, and checking out items.

projects.title: Bot Auto Trader
projects.desc: Bot Auto Trader is a desktop software designed to automate the opening of BUY/SELL positions on a Web Trading platform.

projects.title: Youtube Boosting Tools
projects.desc: Youtube Boosting Tools is a tools to help you ear more insight, by ads or watch time. Wich can help you to easy monetize your channel

projects.title: Dinus PMB Wagtail
projects.desc: Dinus PMB Wagtail is a remake of the Dinus PMB website using Wagtail. This site aims to provide prospective students with detailed information about student enrollment at Universitas Dian Nuswantoro.

projects.title: SiJembar
projects.desc: Sijembar is a website for managing laundry services, featuring an accounting ledger integrated into its dashboard for financial management.

projects.title: Traditional Drink
projects.desc: Traditional Drink is an e-commerce website for selling herbal drinks (jamu) that also includes an integrated accounting system.

projects.title: Local Coffee (Kopi Cening)
projects.desc: Kopi Cening is a website dedicated to marketing Kendal's local specialty coffee, Kopi Cening. It allows for online purchases and includes a product sales management dashboard.

projects.title: S-DatahealthCare
projects.desc: S-DataHealthcare is a website for managing patient medical records. It is designed to allow patients to easily access their medical records across different hospitals.

projects.title: Saweria-like API
projects.desc: Saweria-Like is an API designed to closely resemble a donation website for streamers, similar to Saweria.

projects.title: Dinus Wordpress Plugin
projects.desc: Dinus WP Plugin is a custom WordPress plugin designed specifically to consume APIs from Universitas Dian Nuswantoro.

projects.title: Dinus BIMA
projects.desc: Dinus BIMA is a Student Affairs Bureau website designed to manage various student organizations, where each organization has its own programs.

projects.title: FTP Client
projects.desc: FTP-Client is a software designed to connect to FTP servers, similar to FileZilla, with an interface that splits remote storage and local storage for easy file management.
